text: 2:46 - On Windows, there's an address bar in Explorer (Windows' file/folder browser) that contains the path of the current working directory (cwd or cd). text: My Code : import os import re file_path = os.path.join(os.getcwd(), 'files') l = list(os.walk(file_path)) file_list = l[0][2] for file in file_list:     pattern = re.compile(r'([a-zA-Z0-9_]+)\s?-\s?#(\d)([.a-zA-Z]+)')     search_object = re.search(pattern, file)     if search_object:         file_name = search_object[1]         file_number = search_object[2]         file_ext = search_object[3]         new_name = file_number.zfill(2) + '.' + file_name + file_ext         old_file_path = os.path.join(file_path, file)         new_file_path = os.path.join(file_path, new_name)         os.rename(old_file_path, new_file_path)
